name: 白石洲往事
detailed_description:
The game is produced and distributed by the drill game, and the number of people in the studio is 1.

Game Background:
Time Setting: 2000-present
Location: Baishizhou is a well-known village in Shenzhen, China. Almost all migrant workers begin their dream journey of urban life from places like this.
Now! It's your turn! Yes, it's your turn. As a player, you're just coming to Baishizhou, a village in the city. You're going to start your life from this broken-down rental house.

Game play:
Open world, many plots, especially suitable for trying what you dare not do
In the game, you can do many things, such as work, take-out, shopping, eating, packing, renting, buying houses, and so on. You can also trigger all kinds of plots to achieve various unexpected achievements, or degenerate into ignorance of yourself, or sit around all day and die; in a word, this is an open world of simulation + plots.

Game Culture:
The game tells the story of the protagonist who graduated from 2000 Millennium School, went to some cities and mainly worked in Shenzhen, and rented and lived in Baishizhou.
The protagonist will get some tasks, meet some people, have some stories, the game has no end, the protagonist may die; the final outcome is not the same, according to the protagonist's ability, emotion and random events to determine the outcome;

Game style:
Generally speaking, the slightly decadent style of the game will not be more radical in performance and excessive pursuit of graphic extremes; instead, focus on the performance of the plot, the performance of details of life; more in line with the personality of the players to gradually promote the progress of the game, or climax, or flat.
